receive-pearl.speaker: Lion-chan
receive-pearl.text: W-what's this?@ A pearl?@ You actually… brought it?

options.text: I thought you might like it.
You said they reflect moonlight nicely, right?

pearlreaction1.speaker: Lion-chan
pearlreaction1.text: I-I never said I wanted one!@ You really don't listen, do you?

options.text: Then I'll take it back.
You're holding onto it awfully tight for someone who doesn't care.

pearlreaction2.speaker: Lion-chan
pearlreaction2.text: W-wait!@ I mean—@ you already gave it to me.@ It'd be rude to just— take it back now!@ Right?!

pearlreaction2.speaker: Lion-chan
pearlreaction2.text: Ugh, you're so annoying...@ Fine, I'll keep it. But only because it'd be a waste to throw it away.

options.text: It looks good with your fins.
I'm glad you like it.

pearlreaction3.speaker: Lion-chan
pearlreaction3.text: Wha— I— No!@ I'm just—!@ It's slippery, okay?! I'm holding it so it doesn't float away!

options.text: Right… slippery. Sure.
You're adorable when you try to lie.

pearlreaction4.speaker: Lion-chan
pearlreaction4.text: It's...@ smooth.@ And the way it catches the light...@ kind of like...@ the moon through the water.

options.text: I picked it just for you.
I knew you'd appreciate the shine.

flusterlove1.speaker: Lion-chan
flusterlove1.text: Y-you really don't know when to stop, do you!?@ I'm not blushing! It's the coral again!@ The coral!!

options.text: If you say so, coral cheeks.
You're cute when you get defensive.

bondfinal1.speaker: Lion-chan
bondfinal1.text: Hmph…@ You're impossible.@ But...@ maybe you're not completely terrible to be around.

options.text: I'll take that as a confession.
That's the nicest thing you've said to me.

confession-denial.speaker: Lion-chan
confession-denial.text: C-confession?!@ Don't make me laugh!@ As if I'd fall for some clueless surface-dweller like you!

confession-denial.speaker: Lion-chan
confession-denial.text: I mean...@ even if you *did* bring me a gift.@ A perfect one.@ And said all those stupid, nice things...

options.text: You're smiling, you know.
You don't have to hide it.

lovehint.speaker: Lion-chan
lovehint.text: I...@ I said stop looking at me like that.@ It makes my fins twitch.

options.text: You're beautiful when you're flustered.
I can't help it—you're glowing.

loveend1.speaker: Lion-chan
loveend1.text: G-glowing?@ I...@ maybe it's just the pearl's reflection...@ yeah, that's it.

loveend1.speaker: Lion-chan
loveend1.text: Still...@ I...@ No ones ever done something like this for me before...

loveend1.speaker: Lion-chan
loveend1.text: Here.@ Just take this magic scroll.

loveend1.speaker: Lion-chan
loveend1.text: N-not because I want it or anything!@ I just...@ I don't want you get hurt...@ But only so your gems stay intact!@ That's all!

loveend1.speaker: Lion-chan
loveend1.text: You can use the scroll to see if there is danger down a pathway.

loveend1.speaker: Lion-chan
loveend1.text: Just...@ use it if you don't feel safe

receive-ruby.speaker: Lion-chan
receive-ruby.text: Huh...?@ What's this supposed to be?@ A ruby?@ You actually found one down here?

options.text: I thought the color would suit you.
You said you liked red jewels, right?
Just thought it looked valuable.

rubyreaction1.speaker: Lion-chan
rubyreaction1.text: S-suit me?!@ Don't be ridiculous!@ It's just... a shiny rock!

options.text: Then why are you staring at it like that?
Guess I'll just take it back, then.

rubyreaction2.speaker: Lion-chan
rubyreaction2.text: W-wha—! I'm not staring!@ I just...@ it's rare to see one this pure, that's all!@ It's craftsmanship, not sentiment!

rubyreaction2.speaker: Lion-chan
rubyreaction2.text: Still...@ the way it catches the light...@ kinda reminds me of my fins when the current hits just right...

options.text: Exactly why I thought of you.
So you *do* like it, then?

rubyreaction3.speaker: Lion-chan
rubyreaction3.text: W-wait!@ I mean— you already gave it to me!@ Taking it back would be...@ rude!@ Y-yeah, that's it!

rubyreaction3.speaker: Lion-chan
rubyreaction3.text: Ugh... fine.@ I'll keep it.@ But only because throwing it away would be wasteful!

options.text: You're welcome.

rubytease.speaker: Lion-chan
rubytease.text: Tch. Figures you'd think that way.@ Typical surface-dweller logic— shiny equals valuable.

rubytease.speaker: Lion-chan
rubytease.text: Still...@ you *did* pick a nice one.@ Even if you don't know why.

options.text: Maybe I picked it because it reminded me of you.

rubyflusterlove.speaker: Lion-chan
rubyflusterlove.text: Y-you...@ you can't just say things like that!@ What's wrong with you?!

options.text: You're blushing again.
Don't tell me the ruby's glow is making *you* warm now.

rubyconfession1.speaker: Lion-chan
rubyconfession1.text: I-it's not me!@ It's the reflection!@ This stupid gem just makes everything look red, okay?!

options.text: You really do have a fiery side, huh?
You wear it better than the ruby does.

rubybondfinal.speaker: Lion-chan
rubybondfinal.text: You really...@ never stop teasing, do you?

options.text: Only when it makes you smile.
It's fun watching you try not to smile.

rubyloveend.speaker: Lion-chan
rubyloveend.text: Heh...@ You're ridiculous.@ But maybe...@ a little bit charming too.

rubyloveend.speaker: Lion-chan
rubyloveend.text: Still...@ I...@ No ones ever done something like this for me before...

rubyloveend.speaker: Lion-chan
rubyloveend.text: Here.@ Just take this magic scroll.

rubyloveend.speaker: Lion-chan
rubyloveend.text: N-not because I want it or anything!@ I just...@ I don't want you get hurt...@ But only so your gems stay intact!@ That's all!

rubyloveend.speaker: Lion-chan
rubyloveend.text: You can use the scroll to see if there is danger down a pathway.

rubyloveend.speaker: Lion-chan
rubyloveend.text: Just...@ use it if you don't feel safe

bad-item.speaker: Lion-chan
bad-item.text: What is this?! A {item}!@ Why would you think I want that?@ Get lost

dead-end.speaker: Lion-chan
dead-end.text: Get lost!@ I dont want to hear anything you have to say!
